meanings.definition: The quality or state of being immense.
meanings.sent1: The immensity of the ocean took my breath away.
meanings.sent2: The immensity of the task ahead seemed overwhelming.
meanings.sent3: The immensity of the cake was so big, it could feed the whole town!
meanings.sent4: Her love for him was an immensity that filled her heart completely.
meanings.sent5: The immensity of the mountain range stretched as far as the eye could see.

meanings.sent1: The immensity of the elephant was truly impressive.
meanings.sent2: The immensity of the crowd at the concert made it hard to find a seat.
meanings.sent3: The immensity of the ice cream cone made it impossible to finish in one sitting.
meanings.sent4: The immensity of the problem loomed over them like a dark cloud.
meanings.sent5: The immensity of the forest engulfed them in a sea of green.

meanings.definition: Vastness or greatness in size or extent.
meanings.sent1: The immensity of the desert seemed endless.
meanings.sent2: The immensity of the universe is beyond human comprehension.
meanings.sent3: The immensity of the library overwhelmed her with excitement.
meanings.sent4: The immensity of his knowledge on the subject was truly impressive.
meanings.sent5: The immensity of the storm clouds signaled a coming tempest.
